title: Flaky test - Microsoft.Build.Tasks.UnitTests.DownloadFile_Tests.CanBeCanceled
body:
### Context

Based on the History it fails about once a day in our PR queue: https://dev.azure.com/dnceng-public/public/_build/results?buildId=875750&view=ms.vss-test-web.build-test-results-tab&runId=22853194&resultId=106411&paneView=history

```
Shouldly.ShouldAssertException : task.Result\r\n    should be\r\nFalse\r\n    but was\r\nTrue
```

```
at Microsoft.Build.Tasks.UnitTests.DownloadFile_Tests.CanBeCanceled() in D:\a\1\s\src\Tasks.UnitTests\DownloadFile_Tests.cs:line 52
```
